grid

Class Grid

  • java.lang.Object
    • template.GridTemplate
      • grid.Grid

  • public class Grid
extends GridTemplate
    Creates a grid of squares which is used to determine the location of all the plants, ants, and walls that are currently present in the game.
    Author:
    William Hyun and co-author Dhruv Masurekar

    • Method Detail

      • remove

        public void remove(int r,
                   int c)
        Removes the object that is at the inputed x and y coordinates
        Parameters:
        r - row of the object to be removed
        c - column of the object to be removed

      • toggleWall

        public boolean toggleWall(int r,
                          int c)
        Toggles between a wall and a open space.
        Parameters:
        r - row of the location to be toggled
        c - column of the location to be toggled

      • togglePlant

        public boolean togglePlant(int r,
                           int c)
        Toggles between a wall and a plant space.
        Parameters:
        r - row of the location to be toggled
        c - column of the location to be toggled

      • add

        public void add(int r,
                int c,
                java.lang.Object type)
        Adds an object at the inputed x and y coordinates
        Parameters:
        r - Row location of the object to be added
        c - Column location of the object to be added
        type - the object that is to be added, can be insect, plant or wall

      • get

        public java.lang.Object get(int r,
                            int c)
        Returns the object at r, c on the grid.
        Parameters:
        r - Row
        c - Column
        Returns:
        the object and r, c

      • act

        public int act(processing.core.PApplet marker)
        This method calls the act method of all Insect and Plant objects in the grid.
        Parameters:
        marker - the PApplet object the graphics are being drawn on.
        Returns:
        the number of Insects that are died in this iteration.

      • getInsects

      • draw

        public void draw(processing.core.PApplet marker,
                 float x,
                 float y,
                 float width,
                 float height)
        (Graphical UI) Draws the Plants' shoot method.
        Overrides:
        draw in class GridTemplate
        Parameters:
        marker - The PApplet used for drawing.
        x - The x pixel coordinate of the upper left corner of the grid drawing.
        y - The y pixel coordinate of the upper left corner of the grid drawing.
        width - The pixel width of the grid drawing.
        height - The pixel height of the grid drawing.
